Links to begin play.

Use Access Code "XYZA"

 

Dev: https://quiznowdev.service-now.com/now/quiz/play

Prod: https://quiznow.service-now.com/now/quiz/play

Optional Params

You may include the access code in the path like this:
/now/quiz/play/params/code/XYZA

How to Develop

There are two pages in the experience "QuizNow Game".

Note that the app uses optional params extensively, in cases where state variables might be more familiar.  This is to ensure that the state doesn't get out of whack as the user navigates through the questions (i.e., we don't want to have a question in state that doesn't match the question that the user is currently viewing).

Page: Play

This page is the landing page to start the game.  It has inputs for the access code and your name.  Once a valid 4 character access code is entered and a name is created the "OK" button is enabled and you may continue.

Page: Game

This is the page that manages gameplay.  It has two required parameters to start a game--an access code and a name.  In the current dev mode there is a right arrow in the top right of the screen to start the game and navigate through the questions, but in final form it will use a record watcher to monitor the quiz instance to know when to start the game and when each question is complete.

now/quiz/game/{{code}}/{{name}}/params/question/{{question}}/choiceSelected/{{choiceSelected}}/showScoreboard/{{showScoreboard}}
